l.m: 伏羲攀天梯伏羲在外祖父、
l.e: Fuxi climbing the ladder Fuxi's grandfather,

l.m: 外祖母的悉心呵护下一天天地长大了。
l.e: Grandma grew up day by day under the care of her grandmother.
Since he is the son of Thor,
So different from ordinary people.
he is tall,
tall,
And very smart.

l.m: 离华胥国不远处有个名叫都广的地方，
l.e: There is a place called Duguang not far from Huaxu Kingdom.

l.m: 那里长着一棵粗大无比、
l.e: There grew a huge,
The great tree high into the clouds,
It's called "Jianmu".
Its shape is very special,

l.m: 细长的树干笔直地直耸云霄。
l.e: The slender trunks rise straight to the sky.
There are no branches on either side,
bare,
just at the top of the tree,

l.m: 才长出了些弯弯曲曲的树枝，
l.e: Just grew some crooked branches,
overlapping and circling,
Much like an open umbrella,

l.m: 而且它的树根也是盘旋交错的。
l.e: And its roots are also spiraling and staggered.

l.m: 无论阳光从哪个方向照射，
l.e: No matter which direction the sun shines from,
It has no sun shadow.
Although it is tall,
Can't see the leaves.

l.m: 它的树身上挂着一条条坚韧如藤的树皮。
l.e: Strips of tough, vine-like bark hang from its tree.
When Fuxi was very young,

l.m: 他的外祖母就常常带领他到树下玩耍。
l.e: His grandmother often led him to play under the tree.
Like other kids,
Fuxi is very naughty,

l.m: 常常趁外祖母不注意就往树上爬。
l.e: I often climb up the tree while my grandmother is not paying attention.
Since the trunk is slippery,
None of the other children could climb up.
Only Fuxi is different,

l.m: 他一会儿工夫就能爬很高，
l.e: He can climb high in a short while,

c.m: 一会儿工夫就能爬很高

e.g: You can climb high in a while

l.m: 急得外祖母都不敢再离开他半步。
l.e: Grandma was so anxious that she didn't dare to leave him even half a step.

l.m: 这天祖孙两人又来到大树下玩耍，
l.e: On this day, the grandparents and grandchildren came to play under the big tree again.
In order to avoid his grandmother, Fuxi,
Shaking the tree trunk vigorously,
Immediately the bark fell off,

l.m: 这些剥落下来的树皮似乎是从天而降的无数条黄蛇，
l.e: The peeled off bark seems to be countless yellow snakes falling from the sky,

c.m: 这些剥落下来的树皮似乎是从天而降的无数条黄蛇

e.g: The stripped bark appears to be countless yellow snakes that fell from the sky

l.m: 把整棵大树团团围住了，
l.e: surrounded the whole tree,

l.m: 伏羲便趁机又爬上了树。
l.e: Fuxi took the opportunity to climb up the tree again.
Climb and climb,

l.m: 真不知这树究竟有多高，
l.e: I really don't know how tall this tree is.

l.m: 越往上爬树枝也越多了起来，
l.e: The more you climb, the more branches there are.

l.m: 慢慢地他看不见周围其他的灌木和树木了。
l.e: Slowly he lost sight of the other bushes and trees around him.

c.m: 看不见周围其他的灌木和树木了

e.g: Can't see other shrubs and trees around

l.e: Climb up a little bit,
The wind started to pick up,

l.m: 连雷池的山峰也看不见了。
l.e: Even the mountain peak of Leichi was no longer visible.

l.m: 原来看起来高高在上的云朵这时候竟然跑到他的脚下去了。
l.e: It turned out that Yun Duo, who seemed to be high above, ran to his feet at this time.
I do not know how long it has been,

l.m: 他已经望得见头顶的树冠啦。
l.e: He could already see the canopy above his head.

l.m: 他看见树冠处一团漆黑，
l.e: He saw darkness in the canopy,

l.m: 但偶尔里面有金环闪动。
l.e: But occasionally a golden ring flickers inside.

l.m: 眼看就要接近树冠处时，
l.e: When it was about to approach the canopy of the tree,

l.m: 他突然感觉整个身体像被一股巨大的力量拉着升腾起来。
l.e: He suddenly felt as if his whole body was being pulled up by a huge force.
The power is amazing,

l.m: 拉着他升腾的速度也快得出奇，
l.e: The speed of pulling him up is also surprisingly fast,

l.m: 他感觉自己仿佛在穿越一个长长的黑暗隧道。
l.e: He felt as if he was walking through a long dark tunnel.
After a long time,

l.m: 那股拉着他的力量突然消失了，
l.e: The force that pulled him suddenly disappeared,

l.m: 他像被停在了一个走廊上。
l.e: He seemed to be parked in a hallway.
half an hour,
He just opened his eyes,
take a closer look,

l.m: 原来他站在一个在地上从来没有看见过的美丽花园里。
l.e: It turned out that he was standing in a beautiful garden that had never been seen on earth.

c.m: 一个在地上从来没有看见过的美丽花园里

e.g: In a beautiful garden never seen on earth

l.e: There is no one in the garden,

l.m: 但有很多漂亮的亭台楼阁，
l.e: But there are many beautiful pavilions,

l.m: 水池里的水清澈得一眼见底，
l.e: The water in the pool is so clear that you can see the bottom at a glance.

l.m: 水面上环绕着一道道金色的光环，
l.e: A golden halo surrounds the water,

l.m: 很多像鹏一样的巨大的鸟在水面上追逐、
l.e: Many huge birds like Peng are chasing on the water,
play.

l.m: 伏羲感觉身心清爽多了。
l.e: Fuxi felt much refreshed physically and mentally.
soon,

l.m: 从远处一个阁楼里走出来一位和蔼的白发飘飘的老翁。
l.e: A kind old man with fluttering white hair came out from an attic in the distance.

c.m: 一个阁楼里走出来一位和蔼的白发飘飘的老翁

e.g: A kind old man with white hair came out of an attic

l.e: Fuxi hurried forward,

l.m: 向老翁询问这是什么地方。
l.e: Ask the old man what this place is.
The old man told him:
"This is the back garden of the Jade Emperor,

l.m: 那水池里的鹏鸟是飞往北冥去中途到天上的仙池来戏玩的神鹅。
l.e: The Peng bird in the pond is a goose that flies to Beiming to play in the fairy pond in the sky.
You boy can go to heaven,
There must be great fortune in the future!
" Fuxi felt that he was more spiritual.

l.m: 同时也感到自己身上多了很多以前没有的能量。
l.e: At the same time, I also feel that I have a lot of energy that I didn't have before.
At this moment,

l.m: 他看到平时在地上看到的太阳其实像只发光的金鸟，
l.e: He saw that the sun he usually saw on the ground was actually like a glowing golden bird,

l.m: 全身长满了透明的翅膀。
l.e: The whole body is covered with transparent wings.
I do not know how long it has been,

l.m: 伏羲突然记起了还在树下等着他的外祖母，
l.e: Fuxi suddenly remembered his grandmother who was still waiting for him under the tree,
He hurriedly said goodbye to the old man,
Turn around and walk back.
This time he was confused:
There are pavilions and towers everywhere,

l.m: 当初上来的那棵树在哪儿呢？
l.e: Where is the tree that came up in the first place?
When he was in trouble,

l.m: 一只黑青色的大鹏突然出现在他的面前。
l.e: A black and blue roc suddenly appeared in front of him.
With a thought,
Immediately jump on the back of the peng,
The Peng flew up with him.
He closed his eyes tightly,

l.m: 不一会儿就回到了当初那棵树上。
l.e: After a while, he returned to the original tree.

c.m: 不一会儿就回到了当初那棵树上

e.g: After a while, I returned to the original tree.

l.m: 原来伏羲攀登的“建木”不是一棵普通的树，
l.e: It turns out that the "building tree" that Fuxi climbed was not an ordinary tree.

l.m: 它是沟通天地的一架天梯。
l.e: It is a ladder to communicate with heaven and earth.
The gods of heaven and earth,

l.m: 就是靠着这棵巨树做天梯的。
l.e: It is relying on this giant tree to make a ladder.

l.m: 伏羲也可以沿着天梯——“建木”，
l.e: Fuxi can also follow the ladder - "building wood",
Traveling between heaven and earth.

l.m: 这一切也许都是因为他是雷神的儿子，
l.e: All this may be because he is the son of Thor,

l.m: 总是带有神性的缘故吧！
l.e: Always for the sake of divinity!
